EmailTemplate.name: ES-05-16-2019 KubeCon Meetings.ES-05-13-2019-KubeCon-Meetings-Email1-Synthio
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Enhance Your KubeCon EU Experience (even if you aren't attending)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you attending KubeCon EU in Barcelona this year? If so, we'd love to connect with you and your team.
Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/]]> helps enterprises like yours assure application performance via our AI-powered Workload Automation software.
Here are some options to make a connection:
- Meet the team from Turbonomic at our booth (#P11) <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/kubeconbarcelona2019/external_request/53bfbd]]> and learn about our continuous optimization of Kubernetes services for DevOps - Skip the queue and book a meeting with our technical staff <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/kubeconbarcelona2019/external_request/53bfbd]]> here - Participate in our Scavenger Hunt <[[https://view.ceros.com/turbonomic/kubehunt/p/1]]>
We hope to see you there.
Regards, Andrew
PS - Not attending KubeCon EU? Register for our upcoming webinar, Introduction to Containers and Serverless <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]>.
